name: getzip
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool schweizer_postleitzahlen.
Tool description: API to get political towns from a ZIP-code (Postleitzahl)
A ZIP-code can belong to multiple towns.
The data is updated daily.
API description: Fetch town information based on a provided ZIP code (Postleitzahl) using the RapidAPI.

zip.description: The ZIP code for which to fetch town information.
